::Firearm::

Firearm's eyes widen as he sees the shots heading for him. He transforms into 
tank mode, the missiles and ion disks slamming into the top of the tank, 
rendering the weaponry useless.

"Let's go!" he says to ShadowStalker over his comm-link, driving off. A 
grappling arm extends from his side as he passes ShadowStalker, grabbing him 
and driving off toward the Maximal base, shaking due to thread damage.
